title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-09] [$250] Switch to expensify classic button not working on m-web safari
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/settings/exit-survey/reason on mweb
2. Complete the flow
3. Click green Switch to Expensify Classic button

Expected result: User is redirected to olddot

Actual result: None
